data.text: @burdenkylie1 So true.  I wish our Prime Minister, Scott Morrison, a speedy and full recovery as soon as possible. ✝️🙏✝️
@burdenkylie1 Amen to that. Their problem is always in the mirror.
@vmainard @burdenkylie1 Do you see the deep irony of your post?

@burdenkylie1 Good morning Kylie. Your meme is so true. To be a leftie you have to be a low life that loves being triggered. I am with you and wish Scott Morrison a speedy recovery. The left need to get a life and a moral compass.
